heading: Objective
body: Provide one complete, ready-to-use word-track library for every step of the sales journeyâ€”from first greeting through post-sale follow-up and save-a-deal recovery.

heading: Core Idea
body: Script consistency creates confidence, clarity, and a repeatable trust-first customer experience.

heading: Why Scripts Work
body: A structured language system improves execution under pressure and reduces guest uncertainty.

heading: Execution Standards
body: Use concise language, one purpose per stage, and explicit transitions to guide decisions.
bullets: Short sentences|Ask one question|Confirm and transition

heading: Full Journey Script
body: The scripts tab includes all 15 stages from greeting to save-a-deal follow-up.

heading: Role-Play Focus
body: Practice full-run delivery, objection re-entry, and delivery/follow-up confidence.

heading: Worksheet Purpose
body: Personalize each script while preserving intent and standards.
